Package it.ma.polimi.briscola.model.briscola.twoplayers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Briscola2PMatchConfig
    Interface declaring all the methods a generic Briscol2PMatchConfiguration should provide
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBriscola2PMatchConfig
    Abstract class implementing common methods a Briscola2PMatchConfig should have, and providing some common attributes.
    Briscola2PFullMatchConfig
    Class that represents a Briscola 2 Players Match Configuration and provides methods to manipulate it.
    Briscola2PHand
    Class representing the hand of a Briscola player in a 2 players match.
    Briscola2PMinimalMatchConfig
    Class representing a Minimal Match Config (i.e. a match configuration that can let the player play a match with only the player's informations (the config is not "omniscient").
    Briscola2PPile
    Class representing the pile in a Briscola 2 Players match.
    Briscola2PSurface
    Class representing the surface in a Briscola 2 players match.
